DOC.brief_summary: The successful localization of the y90 microspheres by PET/MR and/or PET/CT scans would be a useful tool in individualizing patient care after the radioembolization procedure. The information from a PET/MR or PET/CT scan would allow for early evaluation of the technical success of the procedure.
DOC.brief_title: Microsphere Localization Using Image Result for Positron Emission Tomography-Magnetic Resonance Imaging (PET/MRI) or Positron Emission Tomography-Computed Tomography (PET/CT) in Patients With Liver Disease
